message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.NE, cs.MM 

The paper proposes a fully automated method for scar quantification in patients with atrial fibrillation using a multi-scale convolutional neural network (MS-CNN) and the graph-cuts framework. This involves image segmentation and analysis, which falls under the computer vision (cs.CV) and machine learning (cs.LG) sub-categories. The use of MS-CNN also suggests a focus on artificial intelligence (cs.AI) and neural networks (cs.NE). Additionally, the paper mentions the use of surface mesh and texture information, which could be relevant to the multimedia (cs.MM) sub-category.
